ratings.notes: proposed_contextual_controlled<TAB>4<TAB>5<TAB>3<TAB>4<TAB>The response is contextually relevant but could be more natural in tone and less formal to align with the persona of a calm healer. Short note: Good, though slightly stiff delivery for urgent care setting.<|end_of_output|>

baseline_no_context<TAB>2<TAB>3<TAB>4<TAB>3<TAB>The response is contextually irrelevant and lacks persona consistency. Short note: Needs to be more immediate, less formal for a healer's tone.<|end_of_output|>
"Response lacks immediate context relevance but maintains persona consistency and naturalness."
